name: Ghostwriter North
tag_list: ghostwriting, writer, ghostwriter, writing, write, edit, editor, editing, proofreader, proofread, proofreading
overview:
We write for you, when words fail you, or there’s no time to spare! Writing & ghostwriting of both fiction & non-fiction books, blogs, web content, business and marketing materials. Full proofreading & editing service for your writing as above, and letters, reports, theses & essays. No job too large or small. High quality work, excellent reputation and highly reliable. Payment by the hour or per job.

Commercial and private clients’ testimonials available. We can work from your notes or drafts, or from your brief.

GHOSTWRITING of books: Ghostwriting is usually done on a ‘services for hire’ basis - whereby your name, all rights and royalties go to you, and I am paid a one-off fee (or in instalments). You gain all rights, credits, sales and royalty payments thereafter. If it is a very interesting or commercial story likely to sell, we could make arrangements to share writing credits or royalties, although a fee payment is still required.

The cost also varies depending on the way we work. Some ways are more expensive or time-consuming than others. We can either:

  • pass drafts between us by email if you’d like to write your own first draft
  • work from your notes, which I can expand if you wished
  • transcribe audio tapes, if you’d rather dictate
  • work via skype or telephone, and chat
  • work from diaries, journals, media extracts or other sources
  • work face to face (subject to time/ travel expenses etc.)
  • work via interview (I ask a series of questions, and you answer them)
  • or any combination of the above. I am entirely flexible, and would rather do a brilliant job for you in whichever way you’d like, than not!

I will go out of my way to suit your circumstances and budget. I have some clients who pay me monthly, some who pay an up-front fee, and then an instalment or two. Again, happy to go with whatever arrangement suits you.

Do you have a certain deadline in mind? An average book would usually take anywhere between two and six months, depending on the amount of material available and whether or not I work on it full-time. Again, I am flexible, and will always aim to meet your requirements or wishes.

Once you’ve decided on how you’d like to work, I can give you an accurate quotation. Or you can tell me the budget you’d like it to fit into, if you prefer - and I can tell you what I can do for that sum. If you have any questions, feel free to drop me an email, or give me a call. Happy to talk. Otherwise, let me know what you think!

Many thanks for your interest!
